Her brother became concerned when she failed to answer her calls and discovered Lynne wasn't at home. Inquiry with neighbors revealed an earlier sighting of her heading towards an old mine near Dunhalin, Rumford, FK2 0SE, accompanied by a friend. The police traced Lynne two days later on West Bridge Street, Falkirk, after receiving a tip from Naomi Shaw. She was found unharmed but disoriented, hinting at a possible misunderstanding of her online group's intentions.
